name: $in-progress
desc: The event has been temporarily stopped but is expected to resume in the future

name: $suspended
desc: The event was  prior to the full completion of the intended actions

name: $completed
desc: This electronic record should never have existed, though it is possible that real-world decisions were based on it.  (If real-world activity has occurred, the status should be "cancelled" rather than "entered-in-error".)

name: $entered-in-error
desc: The authoring system does not know which of the status values currently applies for this request.  Note: This concept is not to be used for "other" - one of the listed statuses is presumed to apply, it's just not known which one.
